value:
So this is the kingdom Askr granted
power... I ought not to remain here
longer than necessary.

Nifl is a land of ice and snow. There,
all is silent, as if time itself has frozen.
That is how I prefer it.

Your power defies the logic of this
world... It is a power even we gods
do not possess.

Fjorm is not so different from
Hvergel... Her smile is— *ahem*
Enough of that.

The potential of mortals knows
no bounds... As gods, even we
can uncover but a piece of it.

I am Nifl, and that is greeting enough.
It is not in my nature to exchange
pleasantries.

Do not be overjoyed. Emotionality
is best avoided.

Temperance and moderation
generate a fine result.

Do not be discouraged. Emotionality
is best avoided.
...What do you ask in exchange?

Lady of one realm of nine, I am Nifl,
called the god of ice. I now walk this
world, having shed half of my divinity.

Fjorm gave her life to me for the
power to defeat her enemies...$k$pContracts compel one to obey the
wishes of another...$k$pWhat is it that you wish for,
$Nu?$k$pWhat do you want so badly that
you would give up your life for it?$k$pEmotionality and desirousness
are foolish. Though, if there is
anything you wish for...speak.$k$pAs for your end of the contract,
we can address that afterward.
はっ
邪魔です
ぐっ。
Futile...
Silence.
I am Nifl.
Ice entomb you.
Freeze.
Hvergel...
Sigh...
Without delay.
Do not lose.
Lady of one realm of the nine, I am Nifl, god of ice.
*gasp* ...Cease your unpredictable foolery.
Be silent. I am beyond your sentimentality.
I will settle this, Múspell... Of this I am certain.
If you wish to see it granted...state your desire.
Yes.
Explain.
It is decided.
I am without companion. I know neither friendship nor love.
Your heart trembles. What disturbs it so?
